abstract: JPMorgan Chase & Company has named Tom Lee chief United States equity strategist, filling the position formerly held by Abhijit Chakrabortti, who has joined Morgan Stanley.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase & Company has named Tom Lee chief United States equity strategist, filling the position formerly held by Abhijit Chakrabortti, who has joined Morgan Stanley.

abstract: Britain’s Northern Rock turned down an offer of 500 million pounds ($1 billion) in funding from JPMorgan Chase that could have eased its liquidity problems, the Daily Telegraph reported.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s Northern Rock turned down an offer of 500 million pounds ($1 billion) in funding from JPMorgan Chase that could have eased its liquidity problems, the Daily Telegraph reported.

headline.main: Northern Rock Said to Reject JPMorgan Funding
